sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { createStructuredSelector } from 'reselect' import { toggleCartHidden } from '../../redux/cart/cart.actions' import { selectCartItemsCount } from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors' import { ReactComponent as BagIcon } from '../../assets/bag-icon.svg' import './cart-icon.styles.scss' const CartIcon = ({ toggleCartHidden, itemCount, dispatch }) => (
dispatch(toggleCartHidden())}> {itemCount}
) const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ itemCount: selectCartItemsCount }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CartIcon)
